channel.title: Posts on WI DPI useR Group
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on WI DPI useR Group

item.title: Sustainable Software in Government (29 June 2018)
item.description: The 29 June 2018 meeting will be a discussion of the following blog post: Why Government Needs Sustainable Software Too. Discussion Questions: Are you a bespoke software engineer … implications for personal workflow? Who produces “Official Statistics”? Which reason for sustainability resonated the most? Outputs really matter … Truth Periodic collaborative authoring (with high turnover) Taxpayers pay for it Others, not mentioned? After our discussion, we will brainstrom a list of future topics to cover.

item.title: Welcome and Redaction
item.description: At today’s meeting, we welcomed some new members from DHS, DCF and DWD. It was fun to make these connections and see how other agencies are using R. In the second half of the program, Carl led a discussion about redacting tabular/aggregated data for external data requests. The focus was on the sdcTable package. The R Markdown file that created the slides are available online here.
